Posts.EditableText: I have just completed Soccer - Rising to Fame, v2.0 - the story's basic 'exoskeleton' is finally completed! I will of course be adding more features. I am planning to add pictures, more mini games and a FAQ section (providing I get enough feedback). So tell me what you think of the basic layout of the game. Also, comment on the website to! Search up 'Soccer' and you should get it straight up. This game was inspired by the game, Soccer career, made by someone else. But anyways, tell me what you think, what else I should add! http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... ng-to-fame ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ Link to website (for some reason I can't attack the file, sorry)
Posts.HTML:
I have just completed Soccer - Rising to Fame, v2.0 - the story's basic 'exoskeleton' is finally completed!

I will of course be adding more features. I am planning to add pictures, more mini games and a FAQ section (providing I get enough feedback).

So tell me what you think of the basic layout of the game. Also, comment on the website to! Search up 'Soccer' and you should get it straight up. This game was inspired by the game, Soccer career, made by someone else. But anyways, tell me what you think, what else I should add!

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ ... ng-to-fame

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
